src.java.searchengine

Class SearchEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.searchengine.SearchEngine

  • public class SearchEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for loading the queries, process them and saving them into a file. This class aggregates many other entities such as, a QueryReader, a QueryProcessor and more, it can have several different representations depending on what entities are being used.
    Since:
    10-16-2017

    • Method Detail

      • processQueries

        public java.util.List<Query> processQueries(java.io.File queryFile,
                                            InvertedIndex idx)
        This method has the same purpose the QueryProcessor.processQueries(List, InvertedIndex, double)
        Parameters:
        queryFile - The file where the queries are contained
        idx - The InvertedIndex with the terms of the corpus
        Returns:
        A List of Query objects that contains the results for them selves

      • saveResults

        public void saveResults(java.lang.String resultFileName)
        This method has the same objective as QueryResultWriter.saveQueryResultsToFile(String, List).
        Parameters:
        resultFileName - The name of the file where the results will be stored.

      • setInvertedIndex

        public void setInvertedIndex(InvertedIndex invertedIndex)
        Parameters:
        invertedIndex - The where the search will take place.

      • setQueryReader

        public void setQueryReader(QueryReader queryReader)
        Parameters:
        queryReader - The QueryReader that is going to be used to read the queries from the a file.

      • setQueryProcessor

        public void setQueryProcessor(QueryProcessor queryProcessor)
        Parameters:
        queryProcessor - The QueryProcessor to be used to obtain results from the invertedIndex.

      • setQueryResultWriter

        public void setQueryResultWriter(QueryResultWriter queryResultWriter)
        Parameters:
        queryResultWriter - A QueryResultWriter to write the results of the queries to a file.

      • setTokenizer

        public void setTokenizer(Tokenizer tokenizer)
        Parameters:
        tokenizer - The Tokenizer to process the queries when they are being read from the file.

      • setQueryIndex

        public void setQueryIndex(QueryIndex queryIndex)
        Parameters:
        queryIndex - A QueryIndex with the queries to be processed

      • setNormalizer

        public void setNormalizer(Normalizer normalizer)
        Parameters:
        normalizer - A Normalizer used to normalize the queries

      • setThreshold

        public void setThreshold(double threshold)
        Parameters:
        threshold - The minimum values of the result scores
